info.description: API for managing data on oncological markers.
info.title: OncomarkerAPI

get.description: Retrieves blood count data.
Retrieves console data.
Retrieves doctor information.
Retrieves patient data.
Retrieves the account settings for the authenticated user.

post.description: Logs in the user and returns an authentication token.
Logs out the currently authenticated user.
Registers a new user and returns the user's email.
Sends a password reset message to the user's email.

get.description: Retrieves a list of blood counts.

put.description: Updates an existing blood count entry.

post.description: Creates a new blood count entry.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all blood count values.

put.description: Updates an existing blood count value entry.

post.description: Creates a new blood count value entry.

get.description: Retrieves a list of blood count values associated with a specific blood count.
get.summary: Get blood count value list by blood count

get.description: Retrieves a list of blood count values associated with a specific disease.
get.summary: Get blood count value list by disease

get.description: Retrieves a blood count value by its ID.
get.summary: Get blood count value by ID

delete.description: Deletes an existing blood count value entry.

get.description: Retrieves a blood count entry by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes a blood count entry by its ID.

get.description: Retrieves a list of course procedures.

put.description: Updates an existing course procedure entry.

post.description: Creates a new course procedure entry.

get.description: Retrieves a course procedure entry by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes a course procedure entry by its ID.

get.description: Returns a list of courses.
Returns a course by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes an existing course by its ID.

get.description: Retrieves a list of diagnoses
Retrieves a diagnosis by its ID

delete.description: Deletes an existing diagnosis by its ID

get.description: Retrieves a list of diseases.
Retrieves a disease entry by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes a disease entry by its ID.

post.description: Creates a relationship between a doctor and a patient.

get.description: Retrieves a list of patient IDs associated with the given doctor ID.
get.summary: Get doctor-patient relationship list by doctor ID

delete.description: Deletes the relationship between a doctor and a patient.

get.description: Retrieves a list of doctors.
Retrieves a doctor by ID.
Retrieves a list of drugs.
Retrieves a drug by ID.
Retrieves a list of patient courses.
Retrieves a patient course by ID.

delete.description: Deletes a patient course by ID.

get.description: Retrieves a list of patient diseases.
Retrieves a list of patient diseases by disease ID.
get.summary: Get patient disease list by disease

get.description: Retrieves a list of patient diseases by patient ID.
get.summary: Get patient disease list by patient

get.description: Retrieves a patient disease by patient and disease ID.

delete.description: Deletes a patient disease by patient and disease ID.

get.description: Retrieves a list of patients.
Retrieves a patient by ID.
Retrieves a list of procedure blood count entries.

put.description: Updates an existing procedure blood count entry.

post.description: Creates a new procedure blood count entry.

get.description: Retrieves a list of procedure blood count entries by blood count ID.
get.summary: Get procedure blood count list by blood count

get.description: Retrieves a list of procedure blood count entries by procedure ID.
get.summary: Get procedure blood count list by procedure

get.description: Retrieves a procedure blood count entry by procedure ID and blood count ID.
get.summary: Get procedure blood count by IDs

delete.description: Deletes a procedure blood count entry by procedure ID and blood count ID.

get.description: Retrieves a list of unit measure entries.

put.description: Updates an existing unit measure entry.

post.description: Creates a new unit measure entry.

get.description: Retrieves a unit measure entry by ID.

delete.description: Deletes a unit measure entry by ID.

description.description: Description of the blood count value. Optional.
